title: Frank Donga
text:
Kunle Idowu, popularly known as Frank Donga, is a <a href="Nigerians">Nigerian</a> actor and comedian. He rose to fame through the webseries, "The Interview," on <a href="Ndani%20TV">Ndani TV</a> about an unassuming job-seeker for which he was nominated for Best Actor in a Comedy in the <a href="Africa%20Magic%20Viewers%27%20Choice%20Awards">Africa Magic Viewers Choice Award</a> in 2015. He has gone on to feature in several movies like "<a href="The%20Wedding%20Party%20%282016%20film%29">The Wedding Party</a>" and its sequel "<a href="The%20Wedding%20Party%202">The Wedding Party 2</a>". Previously working as a journalist, he also works as a photographer and a filmmaker.
Personal life.
Idowu attended Ogun State University (now <a href="Olabisi%20Onabanjo%20University">Olabisi Onabanjo University</a>) where he obtained a B.Sc in Agricultural Science and also the <a href="University%20of%20Ibadan">University of Ibadan</a>, where he obtained a master's degree in Animal Genetics.
Awards and nominations.
<a href="Africa%20Magic%20Viewers%27%20Choice%20Awards">Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards</a>.
